biotools.summary:
IMGT/JunctionAnalysis is the IMGT® tool for the analysis of the nucleotide sequences of the V-J and V-D-J junctions of the variable domains of the immunoglobulins (IG) or antibodies and T cell receptors (TR).
Analysis is based on the IMGT-ONTOLOGY concepts.

bioschemas.name: IMGT JunctionAnalysis
